［《廣韻》昨何切，平歌，從。］
“鹾1”的繁体字。
(1)盐的别名。
(2)味咸。

鹺字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹵字部】　鹺； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1507第29
【唐韻】昨何切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】才何切，?音醝。【說文】鹹也。河內謂之齤，沛人言若虘。【禮·曲禮】鹽曰鹹鹺。【註】大鹹若鹺，鹽味之厚也。　又【集韻】仕知切，音齤。義同。　【集韻】亦書作齤。別作醝，非。

【Haiji 2】【halogen word department】　鹾; Kangxi strokes: 21; page number: page 1507 29
[Tang Yun] How did you cut yesterday [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] How did you cut it? [Said Wen] Salty too. Hanoi is said to be very good, and Pei people say that it is very good. 【Rite·Music Ceremony】The salt is called salty scorpion. [Note] The salty taste is thick and salty.　[Jiyun] Shi knows and cuts, and the sound is great. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】It is also written in a book. Don't be foolish, no.
